availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George T. Humston (Henry County, Kentucky, deputy sheriff and circuit court clerk)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, deputy sheriff and circuit court clerk. Kentucky native. Deputy sheriff in Henry County in 1860. Clerk of the Henry Circuit Court from 1863 to 1867.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision No. 1, p. 23. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District of New Castle, p. 15. William T. Samuels, Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts, of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1865 (Frankfort, KY: George D. Prentice, 1866), p. 11. William T. Samuels, Annual Report of the Auditor of Public Accounts, of the State of Kentucky, for the Fiscal Year Ending October 10, 1867 (Frankfort, KY: John H. Harney, 1867), p. 356.
